name: dynamic-scrollbar
description: This extension transforms the traditional scrollbar into an interactive scrollbar that allows you to monitor background activity. Enjoy a game-changing experience as the scrollbar seamlessly morphs into different shapes, allowing you to stay informed without any distractions.
author: jaemin <roy.jm.lee@gmail.com>

scripts.dev:chrome: NODE_OPTIONS='--loader ts-node/esm' cross-env NODE_ENV=development TARGET=chrome webpack
